data.text: “Klosalokuƒe li
Wokua gayibɔ le tome
Amegbetɔ ɖo seƒe na viviti,
Eɖe do wògoglo yi eme ʋĩi hedidi tso amenɔƒe gbɔ,
Anyigba si me wokpɔa nuɖuɖu tsonae lae wotrɔ
Woɖea safirkpe tso eƒe kpe siwo wogbã la me
Xe ƒonuwo menya toƒe ɣaɣla ma o
Gbemelã siwo dana la meka afɔ afi ma kpɔ o,
Ame ƒe asi gbã kpe sesẽawo
Eɖea mɔ ɖe kpeawo tome
Etsana le tsidzɔƒewo
“Ke afi ka woakpɔ nunya le?
Amegbetɔ mese eƒe nuvãnyenye gɔme o,
Gogloƒe gblɔ be,
Womate ŋu aƒlee kple sika nyuitɔ
Màte ŋu aƒlee kple sika adodoe si tso Ofir alo kple kpe xɔasiwo,
Sika alo kristalkpe masɔ kplii o
Womayɔ sui kple adzagba ƒe ŋkɔwo gɔ̃ hã ɖe eŋu o
Womatsɔ Kuskpe xɔasi, topaz, asɔ kplii o
“Ekema afi ka nunya tso?
Eɣla ɖe nu gbagbe ɖe sia ɖe ƒe ŋkukpɔƒe
Tsiẽƒe kple ku gblɔ be,
Mawue nya egbɔmɔ
Elabena eyae tea ŋu kpɔa anyigba ƒe mlɔenu
Esi wòɖo ya ƒe ŋusẽ anyi,
esi wòwɔ se na tsidzadza,
enye kɔ kpɔ nunya, dzro eme kpɔ
Tete wògblɔ na amegbetɔ be,
